body:
I was trying to install Visit, but got some errors that pointed to HDF5. When I try to install HDF5 I get the following error

```
Fetching https://support.hdfgroup.org/ftp/HDF5/releases/hdf5-1.10/hdf5-1.10.1/src/hdf5-1.10.1.tar.gz 
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 403 Forbidden 
Fetching from https://support.hdfgroup.org/ftp/HDF5/releases/hdf5-1.10/hdf5-1.10.1/src/hdf5-1.10.1.tar.gz failed.
Can not find version 1.10.1 in url_list
Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for hdf5-1.10.1-ttqv45gskffsguej7rtggppd6iqmfb73

>> 28            self.stage.fetch(mirror_only) 
```

I tried to open the above links and it gave me the same error in the browser. How can I fix this?
title: Problem with HDF5 installation
